name.description: Extension name. Displayed in the manifest and pane header

options.description: Alternative text for options button in the pane

swapIconAction.message: Set tabs aside on extension icon click (%TOGGLE_SHORTCUT% or right-click to open the pane)

setAside.description: Save collection action name. Used in the pane, extension context menu and manifest shortcuts

removeTab.description: Button hint on a tab card

removeCollectionConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this collection?
removeCollectionConfirm.description: Prompt dialog content on collection deletion

removeTabConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this tab?
removeTabConfirm.description: Prompt dialog content on one tab deletion

togglePaneContext.description: Context action name. Used in extension context menu and manifest shortcuts

noTabsToSave.description: Alert dialog message when there's no tabs to save

ago.description: Human friendly timestamp part (e.g. 15 hour(s) ago)

minutes.description: Human friendly timestamp part (e.g. 15 minute(s) ago)

hours.description: Human friendly timestamp part (e.g. 15 hour(s) ago)

days.description: Human friendly timestamp part (e.g. 15 day(s) ago)

weeks.description: Human friendly timestamp part (e.g. 15 week(s) ago)

months.description: Human friendly timestamp part (e.g. 15 month(s) ago)

years.description: Human friendly timestamp part (e.g. 15 years(s) ago)
